SESSION_STRING.description: A valid session string, required to attach to an ongoing telegram session

API_ID.description: Your Application ID. Can be found in your API Development Tools (my.telegram.org)

API_HASH.description: Your Application Hash. Can be found in your API Development Tools (my.telegram.org)

PLUGINS.description: A list of plugins you want to use, separated by commas

SUPERUSERS.description: A list of ids of users allowed to fully use this bot. Self is always a superuser. Leave blank for noone except self.

ALLOW_EVERYONE.description: Allow everyone to use bot public command. This effectively bypasses the permission system.

ALLOW_PLUGINS.description: Allow superusers to install more plugins during execution, that won't persist across dyno reboots. Defaults to true.

COMMAND_PREFIXES.description: Characters used to trigger bot commands. Defaults to './!'

EXTRA_CONFIG.description: You can write additional config.ini sections here
